title: CrazyLogin如何导入Authme的数据库
author: my666
txt_content:
Authme由于不兼容某些东西咳咳就不说什么东西了换成CrazyLogin想要导入Authem的密码
帖子说什么自动检测到Authme自动导入试了好多次根本行不通
有高人就说一下到底怎么弄
真的很急！！！

replies.author: cc7w
replies.txt_content:
https://dev.bukkit.org/projects/ ... /encryption/auth-me
阅读这里
1.装载这个子插件
https://raw.githubusercontent.co ... Importer_AuthMe.jar
然后步骤自己翻译就能懂
Copy all AuthMe files in the plugins\CrazyLoginImporter folder
Start server with all these plugins
Execute /crazyloginimport (as Console)
Read the comments!
After import is finished shutdown your server
Disable Importer
Start the server and check if import worked correctly.
Don't forget to change the encryptor!
/crazylogin mode algorithm AuthMe <AuthMe_Algorithm>
